name: Deep (alanrdz19, Akeymi)
description:
A rail shooter game where you are killing sea monsters. Collect all  the 10 skulls to unlock a secret.

This is a prototype made by students of XP - Facultad de Diseño y Producción de Videojuegos for a college proyect. Please leave us comments below about how to improve the game experience.

The full game is still in developement, so we active the donations if you want to support us to create better content.

Please enjoy :D
